originalText.text:
Travis did an amazing job inspecting the apartment my wife and I are interested in. He was extremely communicative while we set up the appointment and afterwards with followup questions.  He wrote up an extremely detailed report covering all the pertinent appliances/infrastructure and addressed our specific concerns extremely well.

Overall a fantastic job and would highly recommend.

originalText.text: Travis of Total Inspections is the ultimate professional! We used his home inspection services to survey a co-op apartment that we were about to purchase. Before even meeting us Travis patiently explained the whole process and was very transparent about his fees which were quite reasonable. Once onsite, Travis was thorough and knowledgeable about all things related to owning an apartment and maintaining it well into the future. He delivered a detail report within days and was available for any follow up questions. I would highly recommend Total Inspections.

text.text: Travis of Total Inspections is the ultimate professional! We used his home inspection services to survey a co-op apartment that we were about to purchase. originalText.text: Travis has conducted two home inspections for us. Both were very thorough and helpful. Scheduling was easy, pricing was reasonable, and payment was straightforward. Both times Travis went above and beyond, including extra components of the inspection as a courtesy. He was also very helpful in providing qualitative input about the findings of the inspections after they were complete, which contextualized the reports and made it easier to get our heads around what they meant. Highly recommended!

text.text: Travis has conducted two home inspections for us. Both were very thorough and helpful. Scheduling was easy, pricing was reasonable, and payment was straightforward. Both times Travis went above and beyond, including extra components of the inspection as a courtesy. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Travis at Total Inspections was awesome! He arrived early and checked out the apartment very thoroughly from top to bottom. He prepared a full and detailed report, with really quick turnaround time (next morning!). We had some specific concerns we let him know about in advance – and he made a point of focusing in on those which helped tremendously in feeling secure about the apartment purchase. Highly recommend Travis and Total Inspections. Very professional, reliable, and quick communication/response time. Travis was also available for follow up questions. During our inspection, we asked him his thoughts on possible renovation questions/what appliances could be moved/etc, and he sent a follow up a couple days later with a few additional points, after he thought it over. So helpful, and definitely exceeded expectations!

So helpful, and definitely exceeded expectations!

originalText.text: I worked with Total Inspections for a home inspection on a co-op that I was considering purchasing. Travis was incredibly thorough and walked me through the inspection process to explain what he had found (as I am a first time home-buyer). Because of the rigorous inspection provided, I was equipped with more information and avoided purchasing a property that needed quite a bit of work. I would definitely recommend Total Inspections to anyone looking for a reputable and thorough home inspection. I will be using them again in the future.
